intent_atoms.description: Connect DocumentSessionController.focusIntegrityDiagnostics() to the forthcoming Integrity tab once UI scaffolding lands.
The Integrity tab navigation wiring must be connected to DocumentSessionController.focusIntegrityDiagnostics() after UI scaffolding is available.
Add targeted snapshot/UI tests that exercise ribbon dismissal persistence and Integrity hand-off when additional tooling is available.
Snapshot/UI tests must cover ribbon dismissal persistence and Integrity hand-off with new tooling.

functional_units.name: Integrity Tab Navigation Wiring
functional_units.description: Connects DocumentSessionController.focusIntegrityDiagnostics() to the Integrity tab for navigation

functional_units.name: Snapshot & UI Automation Expansion
functional_units.description: Adds targeted snapshot and UI tests covering ribbon dismissal persistence and integrity hand-off functionality
